content: I have a general question can you still get accepted into the army if you have flat feet? If it doesn't affect getting accepted can you wear supports in your shoes? Thanks
reply: I have a general question can you still get accepted into the army if you have flat feet? If it doesn't affect getting accepted can you wear supports in your shoes? Thanks
title: Help Please

content: I know several people that just got waivers. Typically, as long as it doesn't cause you any pain or hender you from walking/hiking long distances, there shouldn't be a problem. Ask a recruiter
